metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6605 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: mediaserver in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48T allows attackers to cause a denial of service (process crash) via unspecified vectors, aka internal bugs 20915134 and 23142203, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-7718.

notes.Note: sbeattie> google claims these are all mediaserver crashers and thus DoS only jdstrand> as with previous stagefright issues, this issue affects Ubuntu's android packages, but not in a way that is exposed to apps.  See CVE-2015-1538 for details

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
